text: Hendrik Frans Herrenberg (8 October 1938Henk Herrenberg is trots op de revolutie â€“ 13 December 2024) was a Surinamese ambassador and politician. Herrenberg was a member of the National Democratic Party. He served as an (1982-1984), as the Minister of Foreign Affairs (1986-1987) and a an (1998-1999). Herrenberg also worked as a journalist. Herrenberg died on 13 December 2024, at the age of 86. ==References== Category:Surinamese politicians Category:Journalists Category:Diplomats Category:1938 births Category:2024 deaths Category:People from Paramaribo Category:Place of death missing
